channel.title: Kubernetes Doctor (kubedr) on KubeDoctor
channel.description: Recent content in Kubernetes Doctor (kubedr) on KubeDoctor

item.title: FAQ
item.description: How Much Does Kube Doctor Cost? The CLI is free but you pay for your usage of OpenAPI via the use of your OpenAI API key. kubedr currently uses gpt4. Refer to the OpenAI pricing page for the latest pricing. How Is My OpenAI API Key Used? Your OpenAI API Key is used to make calls to OpenAI on your behalf. What Data Is Collected By KubeDoctor? Kube Doctor doesn’t collect any data.

item.title: Who is building Kube Doctor?
item.description: The team currently consists of Jeremy Lewi Francisco Uribe You can email us at jeremy@lewi.us
